Package org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.io

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LineParser
    Reads lines from an InputStream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteBufferInputStream
    ByteBufferInputStream is an InputStream that delegates reads to a ByteBuffer.
    MagicNumberInputStream
    MagicNumberInputStream is an InputStream implementation that reads ahead and saves the magic number so clients can determine a course of action by peeking at the magic number before they have to read any bytes from the inputStream.
    OpenAwareInputStream
    OpenAwareInputStream is an InputStream that has an extra method OpenAwareInputStream.isOpen().
    OutputStreamFactory  
    PositionlessLineParser  
    RandomAccessFileInputStream
    RandomAccessFileInputStream wraps the given RandomAccessFile in an InputStream.
    StreamUtil
    Utility class for working with Java 8 Streams.
    TextLineParser
    TextLineParser can read lines from on InputStream.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ValueSizeStrategy
    ValueSizeStrategy is a strategy pattern implementation to abstract away the number of bytes read/written to a ByteBuffer.
